name: A/B Test Analysis
description: Analyze A/B test results and make recommendations
prompt_text: Analyze the results of the A/B test '{test_name}' which was designed to validate the following hypothesis: {hypothesis}. The primary metric under evaluation is {primary_metric}, with a sample size classified as {sample_size} and a test duration of {test_duration}. Assess statistical significance, evaluate practical significance beyond p-values, and identify any novelty effects or Simpson's paradox risks across segments. Provide a clear ship/no-ship recommendation with supporting rationale, outline any follow-up experiments that could deepen understanding, and flag any methodological concerns that could affect the validity of the results.

variables.name: hypothesis
variables.label: Hypothesis
variables.placeholder: e.g., Simplifying the checkout to 2 steps will increase conversion by 5%
